  • Classes in org.eclipse.californium.core.observe used by org.eclipse.californium.core 
    Class and Description
    NotificationListener
    Client code can register a notification listener on an Endpoint in order to be called back when notifications for observed resources are received from peers.
    ObserveRelation
    The ObserveRelation is a server-side control structure.
    ObserveRelationFilter
    Define a (sub-)selection of observe relations.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.californium.core.observe used by org.eclipse.californium.core.network 
    Class and Description
    NotificationListener
    Client code can register a notification listener on an Endpoint in order to be called back when notifications for observed resources are received from peers.
    ObservationStore
    A registry for keeping information about resources observed on other peers.
    ObserveRelation
    The ObserveRelation is a server-side control structure.
  • Classes in org.eclipse.californium.core.observe used by org.eclipse.californium.core.observe 
    Class and Description
    Observation
    An observation initiated by a given request, for a particular endpoint context.
    ObservationStore
    A registry for keeping information about resources observed on other peers.
    ObserveRelation
    The ObserveRelation is a server-side control structure.
    ObservingEndpoint
    This class represents an observing endpoint.
